sentence: Sen. Raphael Warnock (D-GA), facing a challenge from Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walker, said in a statement on Tuesday that it is not the right time to end Title 42 ,as Biden set a new record for illegal immigration with more than 209,000 apprehensions in March, alone.
author: John Binder
title: More Vulnerable Democrats Blast Bidens Ending Title 42 at Border
